scripts.deploy:dev: npx cross-env DEPLOYMENT_ENVIRONMENT=development pnpm build:dev && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" ts-node ops/deploy.ts development
scripts.deploy:preview: npx cross-env DEPLOYMENT_ENVIRONMENT=preview pnpm build:dev && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" ts-node ops/deploy.ts preview
scripts.deploy:preview:debug: npx cross-env DEPLOYMENT_ENVIRONMENT=preview WRANGLER_DEBUG=1 pnpm build:dev && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" ts-node ops/deploy.ts preview --debug
scripts.deploy:production: npx cross-env DEPLOYMENT_ENVIRONMENT=production pnpm build && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" ts-node ops/deploy.ts production
scripts.db:init:dev: npx cross-env DEPLOYMENT_ENVIRONMENT=development NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" ts-node ops/init_feed_db.ts
scripts.db:init:preview: npx cross-env DEPLOYMENT_ENVIRONMENT=preview NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" ts-node ops/init_feed_db.ts
scripts.db:init:production: npx cross-env DEPLOYMENT_ENVIRONMENT=production NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" ts-node ops/init_feed_db.ts
